Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1069.jpg'}
{1: 'Hydrangea Island', 2: 'Evening, June 10th - Pleasant and Dry', 4: 'Intensive Care Unit - Medical Research Institute'}
{3: 'In a private facility near the Hydrangea Medical Research District, within its bright, semi-automated compound...'}
{3: 'Outside the ward, an exhausted Reika stands with Kouhei, who maintains a serene composure.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Kouhei, how is Yuka's recovery coming along?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'The surgery was successful, with specific models of nano-machines implanted in sequence.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Currently, the activation rate in the brain's distal regions has reached 98%, exceeding our expected values.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'The computer is currently locating and analyzing. The next step will be signal interference, with an estimated...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Did you not hear me? I'm asking how she's recovering.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'I sincerely apologize.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "The process hasn't been entirely smooth, but fortunately, there were no severe rejection symptoms.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Her vital signs are stable, though she did experience some vomiting and diarrhea after waking up...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'And now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "She's still experiencing nausea and dizziness, but her condition is improving.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Yuka's heart condition isn't the best. Keep a close eye on her.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Don't worry. The ICU is staffed with two doctors and automated medical units on standby at all times.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Let her rest for now. Remember, we can't rush her recovery.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Let's talk while we walk.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika turns and strides straight toward the elevator, with Kouhei quickly falling into step behind her.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1038.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Next week, I'll be leaving the island for a shareholders' meeting with those loaded fat cats.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Do you really need to be there in person?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I'm planning to start a new research project soon, and I'll need to secure additional funding.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "That's why I need to be there physically—to address any questions the shareholders might have.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'A new project? Do you have the capacity to take on additional research right now?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Let me guess, it's research in the field of consciousness, isn't it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'You could say that. For now, the project is still in its preliminary research phase.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'I wish you all the best.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Kouhei, while I'm away, you'll be in charge of overseeing the consciousness projection experiments.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "The research team will follow your direction, and you'll have full access to all my resources.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Let's get straight to the point. There are two main things I need to tell you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'First, at the beginning of next month, we need to conduct a milestone verification for our first consciousness projection experiment...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Have Yuka run simulations on the quantum computer. Focus primarily on data collection.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Once we succeed with one-on-one consciousness projection, we'll proceed with the mass influence experiments.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Therefore, I need you to simultaneously prepare for experiments in Phase II.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "There's a hidden chamber behind the activity room at Mizono High—a secret space that was purposely built during construction.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Set up the signal amplifiers and pulse emission terminals in the hidden chamber. Make absolutely certain everything is in place.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Be smart about this. Don't try to get those things in there when everyone can see you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Understood. You can count on me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Remember to keep a low profile. I want no trouble when I'm away.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "That's all. Exercise your judgment for everything else.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory424.jpg'}
{3: 'As Reika exits the hospital, a black luxury sedan waits for her outside.'}
{3: 'Kouhei steps forward to open the car door, waits for Reika to get in, then bows deeply as the vehicle drives away.'}
{3: 'By the time he straightens up, the black sedan is already far in the distance. He lets out a quiet breath.'}
{3: 'Nearby, a man wearing dark sunglasses slowly approaches Kouhei from behind.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Did something happen?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: 'Chief, our informant just received word...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: "Yoshihiro Osako's assistant has been snooping around for information about us, and I hear they've even contacted the media.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Fool doesn't know his place. What's this guy's name?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: 'I believe his name is Sugiki.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Send some men to pay him a visit. And remember—bring him back alive.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Kouhei narrows his eyes as something crosses his mind, then suddenly breaks into a smile.'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Sugiki, huh... he just might prove useful.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: 'Prove useful... What do you mean, Chief?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "It's none of your concern. Just get it done.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: 'Yes.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1056.jpg'}
{1: 'Misono High', 2: 'Night, June 20th', 4: 'School Gate'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kishii', 3: "Guys, gather 'round! The Horror Stories Club is making its grand debut at Misono High tonight!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: 'Kishii, I thought you were recruiting new members.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: "Hate to say this, but it's pathetic how Itsushima and I are the only ones who got tricked into coming here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "C'mon, cut me some slack already. I've asked literally everyone I could, and now they all think I'm an idiot.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: "Wouldn't say they're wrong, though.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'I even tried asking the super-mysterious Miss Misono. Thought I could promote our club while I was at it.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Itsushima', 3: 'The super-mysterious Miss Misono... You mean Yuka Saotome?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kishii', 3: 'Yup! But she shot me down without a second thought.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: 'How does she manage to be so popular with the guys when she barely even talks?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "See, Hasegawa? That's the thing about being mysterious. That's how she goes around capturing hearts!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: 'Is it just me or did you just sound a little sarcastic there?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Itsushima', 3: "Cut it out, you two. You're driving away the ghosts and spirits with all your noise.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hasegawa', 3: "Don't tell me you actually want to see the ghosts. Pretty sure Kishii's just making this whole thing up.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "I'm not making anything up!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'They say that the sculptures from the art room run wild through the hallways on moonless nights.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "There's no moon tonight—the perfect chance for an investigation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: "The moon's probably just hiding behind the clouds.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "Hey, come on! Let's go!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Kishii pushes the two girls forward from behind as the three of them enter Misono's campus."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1058.jpg'}
{1: 'Inside the School Building', 4: 'Music Room'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hasegawa', 3: "There's nothing here, Kishii.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: 'We just checked the art room you mentioned, and all the statues are standing right where they should be.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: "And now we're in the music room. What? You think those supposedly living statues decided to take music lessons?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Itsushima shines the flashlight down both sides of the corridor, and the glass windows reflect three young, innocent faces.'}
{3: 'The school building, stripped of its daytime bustle, is so quiet that even water dripping in the bathroom echoes clearly through the halls.'}
{3: 'All three hold their breath at once as the wind outside rattles against the windows.'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: "It's just the bathroom leaking.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Itsushima feels her way along the wall to the door and flips the switch, but the classroom lights won't come on."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Itsushima', 3: "So they don't let us use lights at night. Are they worried someone's up to no good or something?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Itsushima', 3: "Let's head back. There's nothing out of the ordinary here anyway.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hasegawa', 3: 'After all, these school horror stories are just "urban myths" that people keep passing around.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: 'Stories tend to stray from the truth based on what the storyteller wants to convey.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: 'Maybe to fill in unclear details, or simply to cover something up...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: 'But anyhow, as these stories get passed around, they gradually take on a supernatural core.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: 'Like that ghost light in the science classroom—it was probably just someone on cleaning duty forgetting to check the desk lamp...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: "And when students happened to see it while leaving school at night, that's how the rumor started.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Itsushima', 3: "But isn't that exactly why we have the Horror Stories Club? To investigate things like this?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Itsushima', 3: "You'll ruin all the fun if you explain everything away, Hasegawa.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kishii', 3: 'Wait, guys, did you hear that just now?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: "Hear what? It's extremely quiet. Quit fooling around, Kishii.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Itsushima', 3: 'No, wait. I think I heard something as well. Hasegawa, shush for a moment.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Itsushima lies down and presses her ear against the floor, sensing slight vibrations coming from below.'}
{3: 'A muffled sound echoes through, like wheels dragging something heavy across the ground...'}
{3: 'Footsteps echo from the stairwell. Kishii and Hasegawa quickly hide themselves.'}
{3: 'A flashlight beam sweeps across from the end of the corridor, then vanishes moments later.'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: 'Is... is someone else here besides us?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "They're coming! It must be those berserk statues!", 4: '3'}
{3: 'Kishii rises to her feet and tiptoes toward the classroom exit.'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: 'Hey, Kishii! You idiot! I-Itsushima... what should we do now?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Itsushima', 3: "Let's follow her. We can't just leave her alone out there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: 'Argh, I swear to God!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'After gently closing the classroom door, Itsushima and Hasegawa head downstairs in pursuit of Kishii.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1072.jpg'}
{3: 'Turning around the staircase, they find Kishii standing dumbfounded outside the activity room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hasegawa', 3: "What are you doing, Kishii? Don't just run off without saying anything!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Out of breath, Hasegawa pats Kishii's shoulder, shooting her an exasperated glare."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kishii', 3: "Hasegawa, have you ever seen what's in here before?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Hasegawa', 3: 'The activity room? What? Is this a joke or...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "That's not what I'm talking about...", 4: '3'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'Kishii points toward the pitch-black activity room, where the once-locked door now stands wide open.'}
{3: 'As Itsushima pushes the door, a thin streak of light mysteriously appears on the floor.'}
{3: "Everyone's eyes follow the trail of light toward the wall, to where the bookshelf should be..."}
{3: 'The bookshelf has been moved aside, revealing a crack in the wall with light seeping through from within.'}
{3: 'While Itsushima and Hasegawa exchange bewildered looks, Kishii has already walked over and placed a hand against the wall.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'With a gentle push, the hidden door concealed within the wall slides backward, sending a cloud of dust rushing forward.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1059.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront21.png', 4: '5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront22.png', 4: '4'}
{3: 'As the view gradually widens, a small dark chamber reveals itself before Kishii.'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'What... what exactly is this?', 4: '3'}
{3: "Kishii's eyes widen at the sight of the massive machinery and advanced equipment filling the secret chamber."}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "Such massive machinery... I've never seen anything like it...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'Looks like some kind of weapon.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'But why would they hide something like this in a school?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'Hey, guys! Come quick, I found something huge!', 4: '3'}
{3: 'No one answers Kishii. An unsettling silence fills the air.'}
{3: 'The girls, who should be right behind her, suddenly fall silent.'}
{3: 'Kishii backs away carefully, only to spot a flashlight rolling across the floor...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'The beam finally comes to rest, illuminating her ankles and casting light across half of the activity room.'}
{3: 'Hasegawa and Itsushima lie unconscious on the floor, one on each side.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kishii', 3: "No... no... this can't be happening...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kishii stumbles backward, her mouth opening to scream...'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A hand clamps over her mouth and nose from behind. After a few seconds of struggle, she blacks out.'}
{3: 'In reality, Kishii collapses but does not immediately lose consciousness. In her hazy state, she overhears several people talking.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'How strange. What are these students doing at school this late at night?'}
{3: 'The sharp crack of a slap rings out.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You useless idiots! I told you to keep watch! How did these rats make their way in?'}
{2: '???', 3: "Do you want all of Dr. Saotome's hard work to go to waste?"}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'Saotome...'}
{3: 'Lying on the ground with unfocused eyes, Kishii mumbles.'}
{2: '???', 3: "You'll all be as good as dead if anything goes wrong!"}
{3: "After struggling to stay awake and failing, Kishii's eyelids finally close as she slips into unconsciousness."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Black-clad Man 1', 3: 'By the way, boss, what should we do with the girls?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Black-clad Man 2', 3: 'Should we take them upstairs and throw them off?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Another resounding slap.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'You idiot, you think people are just gonna believe that these three just committed triple suicide?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'This kind of incident might go unnoticed elsewhere, but at Misono High...', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "It's bound to bring unwanted attention. Do you want people outside of this high school to find out about what happened tonight?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Those reporters from "Misono Bunshun" have been such a pain lately.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Black-clad Man 2', 3: 'What should we do then?', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Take them to the infirmary. I'll call the school nurse right away.", 4: '3'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1055.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront26.png', 4: '4'}
{1: '2', 2: '<size=40>Kishii, Itsushima, and Hasegawa quietly wake up in the infirmary.</size>', 3: '-230', 4: '-50', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{3: 'The next morning, Kishii, Itsushima, and Hasegawa quietly wake up in the infirmary.'}
{1: '2', 2: '<size=40>...there was a gas leak in the school kitchen last night, and they suffered from carbon monoxide poisoning...</size>', 3: '-210', 4: '25', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '3', 2: '<size=40>...which caused them all to have hallucinations, but fortunately they were found in time by patrolling security guards.</size>', 3: '-160', 4: '-45', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{3: 'The school nurse informs them that there was a gas leak in the school kitchen last night, and they suffered from carbon monoxide poisoning...'}
{3: '...which caused them all to have hallucinations, but fortunately they were found in time by patrolling security guards.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=40>Regarding their serious violation of school regulations...</size>', 3: '-100', 4: '95', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '2', 2: '<size=40>...in consideration of their well-being, the school decides not to impose any disciplinary action.</size>', 3: '-110', 4: '25', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '3', 2: '<size=40>Meanwhile, a night curfew is implemented, and evening security patrols are increased.</size>', 3: '-160', 4: '-45', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{3: 'Regarding their serious violation of school regulations, in consideration of their well-being, the school decides not to impose any disciplinary action.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, a night curfew is implemented, and evening security patrols are increased.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=40>Kishii, Hasegawa, and Itsushima must undergo weekly psychological evaluations...</size>', 4: '95', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '2', 2: '<size=40>...and they each must submit a written account of the incident.</size>', 4: '25', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '3', 2: '<size=40>The student activity room will be closed for two weeks for utilities maintenance and wall repairs.</size>', 4: '-45', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{3: 'Kishii, Hasegawa, and Itsushima must undergo weekly psychological evaluations... and they each must submit a written account of the incident.'}
{3: 'The student activity room will be closed for two weeks for utilities maintenance and wall repairs.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=40>And so, daylight saving time officially starts for Misono High.</size>', 4: '50', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{3: 'And so, daylight saving time officially starts for Misono High.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory691.jpg'}
{1: 'Hydrangea Island', 2: 'Afternoon, July 5th - Indoors', 4: 'Quantum Computing Lab - Neuroscience Research Institute'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Good afternoon, Yuka.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Today, we'll be conducting our first one-on-one consciousness projection feasibility test...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "It's just a simulation. The scenarios you'll experience are all computer-generated in real-time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'I shared the documentation with you earlier through email. Do you remember?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Is it going to... hurt?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "You should've thought of that when you decided to participate in this experiment.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "I'll do my best to minimize your discomfort, but I'm afraid we can't rule out unexpected complications.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Dr. Saotome is going to be really disappointed in me if I can't stand the pain, isn't she?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "So that's what this is about... But your concerns are unnecessary.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "If the experiment fails, I'm the one who's going to feel the heat from Dr. Saotome, not you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Our mission today isn't complicated, it's just a one-on-one simulation.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Don't stress yourself out. Just take it easy and go with the flow.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Now then, we can start whenever you're ready.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm ready.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'Yuka walks forward alone, removes her clothing, and enters the sterile laboratory barefoot.'}
{3: 'Behind the one-way glass, Kouhei stands with his hands behind his back, calmly awaiting with anticipation.'}
{3: "The mechanical appendages extending from the massive machine pierce Yuka's spine with their thin needles."}
{3: 'Despite covering her mouth, Yuka cannot suppress her quiet moans of pain.'}
{3: 'This pain, however, is not within her control.'}
{3: 'Yuka is no stranger to pain, and yet she cannot find even a trace of love within it.'}
{3: 'Pain is a peculiar gift—endured in the name of love, yet offering no love in return.'}
{3: 'Her frail body trembles as her pale lips move wordlessly, trying to form speech.'}
{3: 'Finally, she lowers her head and swallows back the words she meant to say.'}
{3: 'On her tear-stained face remains only a feeble smile.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4901_07.jpg'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Dr. Saotome... am I Prometheus now?'}
{3: 'As Yuka whispers these words, her pale lips quickly stain with blood.'}
{3: 'It starts as a trickle, then turns into a constant stream of blood.'}
{3: 'The researchers rush forward to check on her, but Kouhei immediately stops them at the main console.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Leave it. This is all normal.', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Kouhei speaks calmly into the microphone, his eyes devoid of any sympathy.'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Just a little more, Yuka. Everything hinges on this moment.', 4: '18'}
{3: 'After giving the research assistant a meaningful glance, Kouhei turns around...'}
{3: "The massive machinery connected to Yuka's body begins operating at full power."}
{3: "Meanwhile, the quantum computer's mainframe begins tracking signals transmitted from the nanomachines in Yuka's cranium."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory691.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher 1', 3: 'Brain wave capture in progress. All nodal nanomachines positioned... Signal transmission initiated.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Researcher 2', 3: 'Activation successful. Initiating synchronization... Synchronization in progress...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Researcher 1', 3: 'Synchronization rate exceeding 80%. Consciousness field space established. Environment rendering in progress.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Researcher 2', 3: "Chief, the virtual consciousness environment has been established. Yuka's consciousness copy is complete.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Good. Activate the amplifier and projector. Proceed to the next phase.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher 2', 3: 'Consciousness projection ready, Chief. Please equip your jamming device.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'One by one, Kouhei and everyone in the control room put on their electromagnetic shield devices for protection against field effects.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Let's get started.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Researcher 1', 3: 'Initiating first consciousness projection. Deploying interference field.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'As the quantum computer powers up, readings on the main control panel begin to fluctuate.'}
{3: "In the laboratory, Yuka's head jerks up as if shocked by electricity. Before her eyes, the surrounding scenery begins to fade away."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory954.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory955.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2601_11.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory460.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory627.jpg'}
{3: 'Bizarre, kaleidoscopic lights flash past. When awareness returns, she finds herself standing barefoot in a vast sea of grey.'}
{3: 'However, her hearing and awareness of the outside world remain intact, and Yuka maintains her clarity of mind.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory691.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Yuka, how are you holding up?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Where am I...', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "What you're seeing should be the materialized space of the collective unconscious network.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "To be honest, even I don't know what you're seeing. Why don't you tell me about it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I see a sea... A completely still sea.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'A sea? So this is what the consciousness domain space looks like... A sea of consciousness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Besides that, what else do you see?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Stars twinkle where the sky meets the sea in the distance, but they remain just out of reach.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "But there's this similar glowing object nearby too.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "It's like human thoughts, human voices...", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Good. Try to touch that marker point, then await further instructions.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kouhei holds the microphone firmly and turns around to gesture at the researcher, who nods in understanding.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory627.jpg'}
{3: 'In the virtual "sea of consciousness", Yuka carefully reaches out to touch the speck of light.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHuiyisha01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{3: "Her consciousness merges with someone else's perspective and, with it, her surroundings transform into white walls."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I can feel the fear and pain... and above all, an inescapable despair.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Why... why is this person in such agony? Their suffering is even greater than mine...', 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Yuka, you've entered the target's consciousness. Now, try to take control of their body.", 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'What do I need to do?', 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: "There's a gun to his right. Pick it up and put him out of his misery.", 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "What...? I'm sorry, but I can't do something like that.", 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'This is just a computer simulation, not a real person. What are you so afraid of?!', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "If you can't even do this much, our experiment will be deemed a failure.", 4: '18'}
{3: "The words leave Kouhei's lips like ice, each syllable carrying the weight of a command and the edge of a threat."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront25.png', 4: '4'}
{3: "After a brief moment of hesitation, Yuka takes control of the trembling hand, slowly raising the gun to press it against the target's temple."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront17.png', 4: '4'}
{3: 'And she pulls the trigger.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHuiyisha01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHongBg.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "In the wake of the deafening gunshot, Yuka's M.I.N.D. is flooded with crimson."}
{3: 'She collapses into the crimson sea, letting the waves wash away what little sanity remains.'}
{3: 'Sinking deeper and deeper into the bottomless abyss...'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHongBg.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory691.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher 1', 3: 'Chief, Yuka has lost consciousness.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Medical team, move in and assist. Let her rest for a few days.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Then, Kouhei takes a deep breath.'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'I hereby declare the first one-on-one consciousness projection experiment a success.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Almost immediately, applause erupts from the main console as the scientists rise one by one to celebrate.'}
{3: 'Kouhei waves for everyone to settle down, then takes his leave amid their respectful farewells.'}
{3: 'Outside, a figure in black is already waiting. Together, they proceed to the adjacent room.'}
{3: 'As the door opens, a man bound to a chair hangs his head low, blood streaming from the wound on his scalp.'}
{3: "Kouhei's lips curl into a satisfied smile as he picks up the gun from the floor and unloads its ammunition."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Sugiki, this is what happens when you stand against us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Dying like a dog... Now you can reunite with Mr. Osako.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'At least you made some contribution to science. Be grateful for that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Hey, dispose of the body.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Oh, and one more thing—there's no need to tell Dr. Saotome about using human test subjects.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: 'Roger.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{1: 'July 5th. The first consciousness projection experiment is declared a success.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'The Saotome team rushes to complete human trials despite unclear theoretical foundations.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: "Dr. Reika Saotome's career-risking gamble earns her significant acclaim at the shareholders' meeting.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'Anonymous invitations from major research institutions start pouring in, followed by venture capital funds catching wind of the opportunity...', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'The experimental details remain undisclosed, citing sensitive technology still under development.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Regarding this matter, Dr. Saotome makes the following statement in an interview—', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'The entire consciousness projection experiment process is safe, humane, and follows objective scientific principles.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'August. Building on the successful verification of one-on-one consciousness projection technology...', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Preparations for mass consciousness projection experiments are conducted at a fevered pace.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: "Kouhei plans to conduct the experiment during the track and field team's victory celebration on August 16th.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'The participating students are not informed of the experiment—a unilateral decision made by Kouhei.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1052.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Girl From the Track Team', 3: "Yata, have you heard? There's this rumor going around...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Rumor? I'm not really interested.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl From the Track Team', 3: 'You know, that one... The eighth mystery of Misono High—"The Eternal Night Fog".', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'The Eternal Night Fog?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl From the Track Team', 3: "Legend says that on moonless nights, a blood-red fog rises within Misono's campus.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Girl From the Track Team', 3: 'The fog lingers until dawn, drifting through every corner of the school grounds.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Girl From the Track Team', 3: "If you're not gone by dusk and the fog catches up to you...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Girl From the Track Team', 3: 'You might get lost in the fog, or worse—you could be spirited away forever!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Hey, that's scary... Don't turn this into some horror story all of a sudden!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl From the Track Team', 3: "I heard someone encountered it after their club activities. They weren't found until the next day, unconscious in the hallway.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Girl From the Track Team', 3: 'You know that campus curfew that just came into effect recently?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Girl From the Track Team', 3: "That's exactly what the curfew is for!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Come on, it's probably just another recycled urban legend.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'The thing about school horror stories...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: '...is that they\'re nothing more than "urban myths" that people keep passing around...', 4: '1'}
